instructions.reason_for_call: .You are angry about the quality of the two skateboards you just bought. You want to return them and refund to credit card. If the agent asks for confirmation, do not say yes immediately, because you also want to return the smart watch. You also want to return the e-reader you just bought. If the same item is available online, you're willing to exchange it to the same item. If the agent doesn't allow the exchange, get the 7-inch, 8GB of storage and Wi-Fi connectivity E-Reader instead.
instructions.known_info: You name is Mei Ahmed and your zip code is 78705.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hi there! I'm calling because I'm actually quite upset about the quality of two skateboards I recently purchased. I'd like to return them and get a refund back to my credit card, please.

message.content: Hi there! I'm calling because I'm actually quite upset about the quality of two skateboards I recently purchased. I'd like to return them and get a refund back to my credit card, please.

messages.content:
I'm very sorry to hear that you're unhappy with the quality of the skateboards you received. I can certainly help you with a return for a refund to your credit card.

To get started, I'll need to authenticate your account. Could you please provide the email address associated with your order? Alternatively, I can look you up using your full name and zip code.

message.content:
